Title: Simulation of the performance of aerobic granular sludge SBR using modified ASM3 model
Authors: Man Zhou, Jianyu Gong, Changzhu Yang, Wenhong Pu
Abstract: The activated sludge model No. 3 (ASM3) was modified to describe the biological reactions in aerobic granular sludge SBR. The simultaneous storage and growth, nitrification and denitrification were all accounted for in modified model. The sensitivities of effluent COD, NH4+–N, and TN toward the stoichiometric and kinetic coefficients were analyzed. A standard set of parameters obtained from a combination of literature data was chosen for the model. The experimental results for the time profile of COD, NH4+–N, and TN in a typical cycle were used to verify the ASM3 model. The verification results show the model established is applicable for simulating the performance of an aerobic granule-based SBR. A comparison of the measured and predicted values of substrate removal for both the modified ASM3 and the original ASM3 was also performed. The verification and comparison results show the modified ASM3 model describes the aerobic granule-based SBR better and more mechanistically.
GEMINI_What_problem_does_this_paper_atte: - The original ASM3 model has limitations in describing the performance of aerobic granular sludge in Sequencing Batch Reactors (SBRs).\n- ASM3 assumes all readily biodegradable substrates are taken up first and stored as internal cell polymers before growth, which fails to describe the simultaneous feast-famine behavior (simultaneous storage and growth) in SBRs.\n- ASM3 assumes nitrification and denitrification are single-step processes, neglecting nitrite ($NO_2^-$) as an intermediate product, which is significant when nitrite accumulates in aerobic granular systems.
GEMINI_How_the_paper_solves_this_problem:
- Modified the ASM3 model by introducing the concept of simultaneous aerobic/anoxic storage and growth of organic substrates by heterotrophic bacteria.
- Incorporated a two-step nitrification and denitrification process, including nitrite as an intermediate compound.
- Replaced the original autotrophic biomass ($X_A$) with two new model compounds: ammonium oxidizing bacteria ($X_{AOB}$) and nitrite oxidizing bacteria ($X_{NOB}$).
- Constructed a modified model with 13 components and 22 microbial processes, summarized in a matrix format.
- Conducted sensitivity analysis to evaluate and calibrate 11 important kinetic and stoichiometric parameters.
- Implemented the model using Matlab and verified it against experimental data from a laboratory-scale granular sludge SBR.
GEMINI_What_experiments_were_done_for_th:
- Operated a laboratory-scale Sequencing Batch Reactor (SBR) with a working volume of 8 L, fed with synthetic wastewater.
- Cultivated aerobic granules from activated sludge.
- Measured chemical oxygen demand (COD), $NH_4^+-N$, total nitrogen (TN), mixed liquor suspended solids (MLSS), dissolved oxygen (DO), and pH during the steady state.
- Conducted a typical cycle experiment (2 min feeding, 354 min aeration, 3 min settling, 1 min effluent discharge) to obtain time-profile data for COD, $NH_4^+-N$, and TN.
- Performed model simulation, sensitivity analysis, calibration, and verification using the experimental data.
GEMINI_What_are_the_points_that_can_be_e:
- The deviation in the simulated TN concentration compared to measured values suggests that the denitrification process or simultaneous nitrification-denitrification (SND) mechanisms inside the granules could be further refined.
- The model could be extended to include phosphorus removal processes (e.g., integrating ASM2d features).
- Spatial distribution of microorganisms and mass transfer limitations (diffusion) within the 3D structure of the aerobic granules could be incorporated for a more mechanistic multi-scale model.
- Validation of the modified model using real municipal or industrial wastewater instead of synthetic wastewater.
GEMINI_Summarize_the_main_points_of_the_:
- A modified ASM3 model was successfully developed to simulate the biological conversion processes in an aerobic granular sludge SBR.
- The modifications included simultaneous storage-growth and two-step nitrification-denitrification (via nitrite).
- Sensitivity analysis identified 11 key parameters that significantly influence COD, $NH_4^+-N$, and TN outputs, which were then calibrated.
- The modified model showed excellent agreement with experimental data (99.7% for COD, 97.9% for $NH_4^+-N$, and 92.4% for TN).
- Compared to the original ASM3, the modified model provided a much more accurate and mechanistic description of the rapid COD removal and nitrogen dynamics in the aerobic granule-based SBR.
GEMINI_What_are_the_relevant_studies:
- Krishna et al. (1999) Substrate flux into storage and growth in relation to activated sludge modelling.
- Ni et al. (2008) Modeling simultaneous autotrophic and heterotrophic growth in aerobic granules.
- Sin et al. (2005) A new approach for modeling simultaneous storage and growth processes for activated sludge systems under aerobic conditions.
- Henze et al. (2000) Activated Sludge Models ASM1, ASM2, ASM2d, and ASM3.
- Kaelin et al. (2009) Extension of ASM3 for two-step nitrification and denitrification and its calibration and validation with batch tests and pilot scale data.
- de Kreuk et al. (2007) Kinetic model of a granular sludge SBR: influences on nutrient removal.
- Su et al. (2006a) A generalized model of aerobic granule-based sequencing batch reactor—I. Model development.
zh_Abstract: 活性污泥模型No. 3 (ASM3) 被修改用于描述好氧颗粒污泥SBR中的生物反应。修改后的模型考虑了同步储能与生长、硝化与反硝化过程。分析了出水COD、NH4+–N和TN对化学计量和动力学系数的敏感性。模型选用了一套结合文献数据获得的标准参数集。利用典型周期内COD、NH4+–N和TN的时间分布实验结果对ASM3模型进行了验证。验证结果表明，所建立的模型适用于模拟好氧颗粒污泥SBR的性能。此外，还对修改后的ASM3和原始ASM3的底物去除测量值与预测值进行了比较。验证和比较结果表明，修改后的ASM3模型能更好、更具机制性地描述基于好氧颗粒污泥的SBR。
GEMINI_zh_What_problem_does_this_paper_a: - 原始的ASM3模型在描述序批式反应器（SBR）中好氧颗粒污泥的性能时存在局限性。\n- ASM3假设所有易生物降解的底物首先被吸收并储存为内部细胞聚合物，然后再用于生长，这无法准确描述SBR中异养菌的“饱食-饥饿”行为（即同步储能与生长）。\n- ASM3假设硝化和反硝化都是单步过程，忽略了亚硝酸盐（$NO_2^-$）作为中间产物的作用，而这在亚硝酸盐容易积累的好氧颗粒污泥系统中是非常重要的。
GEMINI_zh_How_the_paper_solves_this_prob:
- 对ASM3模型进行了修改，引入了异养细菌对有机底物的同步好氧/缺氧储能与生长的概念。
- 引入了两步硝化和反硝化过程，将亚硝酸盐作为中间化合物包含在内。
- 用氨氧化细菌（$X_{AOB}$）和亚硝酸盐氧化细菌（$X_{NOB}$）两个新的模型组分取代了原始的自养生物量（$X_A$）。
- 构建了包含13个组分和22个微生物过程的修改模型，并以矩阵形式进行了总结。
- 进行了敏感性分析，以评估和校准11个重要的动力学和化学计量参数。
- 使用Matlab实现该模型，并利用实验室规模的颗粒污泥SBR的实验数据对其进行了验证。
GEMINI_zh_What_experiments_were_done_for:
- 运行了一个工作体积为8 L的实验室规模序批式反应器（SBR），并采用人工合成废水进行进水。
- 利用当地污水处理厂的活性污泥培养出好氧颗粒污泥。
- 在系统达到稳态期间，测量了化学需氧量（COD）、$NH_4^+-N$、总氮（TN）、混合液悬浮固体（MLSS）、溶解氧（DO）和pH值。
- 进行了一个典型周期实验（2分钟进水，354分钟曝气，3分钟沉淀，1分钟出水），以获取COD、$NH_4^+-N$和TN的时间分布数据。
- 利用实验数据进行了模型模拟、敏感性分析、参数校准和模型验证。
GEMINI_zh_What_are_the_points_that_can_b:
- 模拟的TN浓度与测量值之间存在一定偏差，表明颗粒内部的反硝化过程或同步硝化反硝化（SND）机制可以进一步细化。
- 该模型可以进一步扩展以包含除磷过程（例如，整合ASM2d的特征）。
- 可以将微生物的空间分布和好氧颗粒3D结构内的传质限制（扩散）纳入其中，以建立更具机制性的多尺度模型。
- 可以使用真实的城市或工业废水代替合成废水来进一步验证修改后的模型。
GEMINI_zh_Summarize_the_main_points_of_t:
- 成功开发了一个修改版的ASM3模型，用于模拟好氧颗粒污泥SBR中的生物转化过程。
- 模型的修改主要包括引入同步储能-生长机制以及（经由亚硝酸盐的）两步硝化-反硝化过程。
- 敏感性分析确定了11个对COD、$NH_4^+-N$和TN输出有显著影响的关键参数，并对这些参数进行了校准。
- 修改后的模型与实验数据高度吻合（COD拟合度为99.7%，$NH_4^+-N$为97.9%，TN为92.4%）。
- 与原始ASM3相比，修改后的ASM3模型能够更准确、更具机制性地描述好氧颗粒污泥SBR中快速的COD去除和氮动态变化。
GEMINI_zh_What_are_the_relevant_studies:
- Krishna et al. (1999) Substrate flux into storage and growth in relation to activated sludge modelling.
- Ni et al. (2008) Modeling simultaneous autotrophic and heterotrophic growth in aerobic granules.
- Sin et al. (2005) A new approach for modeling simultaneous storage and growth processes for activated sludge systems under aerobic conditions.
- Henze et al. (2000) Activated Sludge Models ASM1, ASM2, ASM2d, and ASM3.
- Kaelin et al. (2009) Extension of ASM3 for two-step nitrification and denitrification and its calibration and validation with batch tests and pilot scale data.
- de Kreuk et al. (2007) Kinetic model of a granular sludge SBR: influences on nutrient removal.
- Su et al. (2006a) A generalized model of aerobic granule-based sequencing batch reactor—I. Model development.
